sentence.Network_en: Her grace, quickness, her social felicities - seemed the overflow of a bounteous nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 她端庄的仪态, 敏捷的反应, 伶俐的口才都似乎是多余的了.

sentence.Network_en: Because of the spring rains, the farmers had a bounteous crop.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为下了春雨, 农夫获得了丰收.

iBT TOEFL 难词速记宝典 - 豆丁网 ... around 在附近)， bounteous 慷慨的， 宽宏大量的) stain 污点)→远离污点→自愿戒绝参考词.

list.abs: ... a vague,inchoate idea. 一个模糊的、尚未成熟的想法 a bounteous repast 丰盛的一餐 a collateral consanguinity 旁系亲族.
My wee assistance in your bounteous hand , and the odor of tobacco., 我的小手在你的大手里 , 还有烟草的味道.
Let us give bounteous love to all mankind ., 让我们献给人类无限的情怀.
We are grateful to you for your bounteous gifts ., 对您给予的丰厚礼物 , 我们不胜感激.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French bontif, -ive 'benevolent' (from bonte 'bounty'), on the pattern of plenteous

auth_sentence.content: The marvelous genome program moved David to express gratitude for his bounteous Maker.

auth_sentence.content: At Majdac, the granny, Anica, sighs and tuts as she clears away the leftovers from a bounteous dinner.

auth_sentence.content: Leaf-eating animals from the forest moved out onto the plains to feed on the bounteous grass.
